Questions.Question: What does '内' (Nèi) mean in Chinese?
What is the meaning of '内人' (Nèi rén) in Chinese?
Which phrase means 'The content of this book is good' in Chinese?

Options.A: 这本书的内人很好 Zhè běn shū de nèi rén hěn hǎo
Options.B: 这本书的内宝很好 Zhè běn shū de nèi bǎo hěn hǎo
Options.C: 这本书的内内容很好 Zhè běn shū de nèi nèiróng hěn hǎo
Options.D: 这本书的内容很好 Zhè běn shū de nèiróng hěn hǎo (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: What does '台' (Tái) mean in Chinese?
What is the translation of '讲台' (Jiǎngtái) in Chinese?
What is the meaning of '因为' (Yīnwèi) in Chinese?
Which sentence means 'Because I am very busy, I am tired' in Chinese?

Options.A: 因为他很聪明所以学得很快 (Yīnwèi tā hěn cōngmíng suǒyǐ xué dé hěn kuài)
Options.B: 因为太晚了所以我要回家了 (Yīnwèi tài wǎnle suǒyǐ wǒ yào huí jiāle)
Options.C: 因为我很忙所以我很累 (Yīnwèi wǒ hěn máng suǒyǐ wǒ hěn lèi) (Correct Answer)
Options.D: 因为我会说中文 (Yīnwèi wǒ huì shuō zhōngwén)

Questions.Question: What does '问题' (Wèntí) mean in Chinese?
Which phrase means 'Please leave your telephone number' in Chinese?

Options.A: 请你留个电话号码 (Qǐng nǐ liú gè diànhuà hào mǎ) (Correct Answer)
Options.B: 请问书店在哪儿 (Qǐngwèn shūdiàn zài nǎ'er)
Options.C: 请你留意这件事 (Qǐng nǐ liúyì zhè jiàn shì)
Options.D: 请问有什么事吗 (Qǐngwèn yǒu shé me shì ma)

Questions.Question: What does '过' (Guò) mean in Chinese?
What does '通' (Tōng) mean in Chinese?
What is the translation of '电话通了吗' (Diànhuà tōngle ma) in Chinese?
What does '讲' (Jiǎng) mean in Chinese?
Which sentence means 'Don’t talk in class' in Chinese?

Options.A: 他跟你讲了什么 (Tā gēn nǐ jiǎngle shénme)

Options.C: 老师在讲台上讲课 (Lǎoshī zài jiǎngtái shàng jiǎngkè)
Options.D: 别吃坏的东西 (Bié chī huài de dōngxī)

Questions.Question: What does '坏' (Huài) mean in Chinese?
What is the translation of '电话坏了吗' (Diànhuà huàile ma) in Chinese?
What does '接' (Jiē) mean in Chinese?
Which phrase means 'Nobody answered the phone' in Chinese?

Options.B: 李先生刚说完，张先生又接着说 (Lǐ xiānshēng gāng shuō wán, zhāng xiānshēng yòu jiēzhe shuō)
Options.C: 电话还没通 (Diànhuà hái méi tōng)
Options.D: 别吃坏的东西 (Bié chī huài de dōngxī)

Questions.Question: What does '周末' (Zhōumò) mean in Chinese?
What is the translation of '请告诉我你的地址' (Qǐng gàosù wǒ nǐ dì dìzhǐ) in Chinese?

Options.A: Please tell me your address. (Correct Answer)

Questions.Question: What does '地址' (Dìzhǐ) mean in Chinese?
What is the meaning of '视屏' (Shìpíng) in Chinese?
Which sentence means 'I miss my family, so I often go home on weekends' in Chinese?

Options.A: 会不会太麻烦你们？(Huì bù huì tài máfan nǐmen?)
Options.B: 这个周末你到我家来玩两天吧！(Zhège zhōumò nǐ dào wǒjiā lái wán liǎng tiān ba!)
Options.C: 是的，我很想家，所以我周末常回去。(Shì de, wǒ hěn xiǎng jiā, suǒyǐ wǒ zhōumò cháng huíqù.) (Correct Answer)
Options.D: 你一个人住在外面，一定很不方便。(Nǐ yīgè rén zhù zài wàimiàn, yīdìng hěn bù fāngbiàn.)

Questions.Question: What is the translation of '不用了，给我你家的地址，我一定找得到' (Bùyòngle, gěi wǒ nǐ jiā dì dìzhǐ, wǒ yīdìng zhǎo dédào) in Chinese?

Options.A: No, you don't need to. If you give me your address, I'm sure I can find it. (Correct Answer)
Options.B: Yes, please come to my house this weekend.
Options.C: I'll pick you up this weekend.
Options.D: Is it convenient to stay in your house?

Questions.Question: What does '方便' (Fāngbiàn) mean in Chinese?
What is the meaning of '太好了，我很喜欢打球' (Tài hǎole, wǒ hěn xǐhuān dǎqiú) in Chinese?

Options.A: Good. I like to play ball. (Correct Answer)
Options.B: Can you come to my house this weekend?
Options.C: It must be very inconvenient to live by yourself.
Options.D: It's not. My parents welcome my friends.

Questions.Question: Which sentence means 'Is it convenient to stay in your house?' in Chinese?

Options.A: 太好了，我很喜欢打球。(Tài hǎole, wǒ hěn xǐhuān dǎqiú)
Options.B: 会不会太麻烦你们？（Huì bù huì tài máfan nǐmen?）
Options.C: 住在你家方便吗？（Zhù zài nǐ jiā fāngbiàn ma?）(Correct Answer)
Options.D: 周末我来接你。（Zhōumò wǒ lái jiē nǐ.）

Options.A: 用笔记下来 Yòng bǐjì xiàlái
Options.B: 你记得那个人吗？Nǐ jìdé nàgè rén ma?

Options.D: 他记住了 Tā jì zhùle

Questions.Question: What does '聪明' (Cōngmíng) mean in Chinese?
Which sentence means 'Last time I got lost because you were talking to me all the time, and I forgot to turn' in Chinese?

Options.A: 上次小王来，找了半天，也没找到 (Shàng cì xiǎo wáng lái, zhǎole bàntiān, yě méi zhǎodào)
Options.B: 那是因为你一直跟我说话，所以我忘了转弯。（Nà shì yīnwèi nǐ yīzhí gēn wǒ shuōhuà, suǒyǐ wǒ wàngle zhuǎnwān.） (Correct Answer)
Options.C: 你好像忘记了 (Nǐ hǎoxiàng wàngjìle）
Options.D: 你一号就找到了 (Nǐ yī hào jiù zhǎodàole）

Questions.Question: What does '行' (Xíng) mean in Chinese?
Which sentence means 'Such conduct is wrong.' in Chinese?

Options.A: 你到银行去做什么？(Nǐ dào yínháng qù zuò shénme?)
Options.B: 多练习, 自然就会了。(Duō liànxí, zìrán jiù huìle.)

Options.D: 学生淡然因该用功。(Xuéshēng dànrán yīn gāi yònggōng.)

Questions.Question: What does '然' (Rán) mean in Chinese?
